trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" /> 類別提供資料的設計階段檢視。

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 父代 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView" /> with the provided data source designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的資料來源設計工具，建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports deletes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> 控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> 物件是否支援刪除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if deletes are supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援刪除則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports inserts.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> 控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> 物件是否支援插入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if inserts are supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援插入則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports paging through data returned by a query.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> 控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> 物件是否支援透過查詢傳回資料的分頁。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if paging is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援分頁，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> 控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> 物件是否支援基礎資料來源的排序檢視。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control supports updates.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView" /> 控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> 物件是否支援更新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if updates are supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援更新則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的資料列數目下限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示傳回的資料是範例資料，<see langword="false" /> 則表示傳回的資料是實際資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計階段資料，該資料符合使用所指定資料列數之相關資料來源控制項的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: 要在設計階段顯示的資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出資料是範例或真實資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
trans-unit.target: 取得結構描述，說明目前檢視物件所表示的資料來源檢視。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the schema.
trans-unit.target: 表示結構描述的物件。
